abstract.t: Internet applications have been enhanced with many features.A feature may be defined as a unit of functionality in a system, havinga self-contained role.However, the introduction and modification of features may result inundesired behaviors, and this effect is known as feature interaction-FI for short.This document provides a description of the FI problem in Internet, themain problems to be solved in the FI resolution, and compares somesolutions for FI identification and resolution explored that have beendiscussed in the literature.
